title: One Roommate needed!- $850
posting_body: This first floor apartment is located in a 3-family Victorian home nestled in a quiet & friendly neighborhood of North Quincy and a very short walk to a vast array of commercial activity along Hancock Street and Billings Road.
The supermarket, liquor store, lots of restaurants, as well as specialty shops such as a cheap but good seamstress are all within a 2- to 5-minute walk.
This 5 room apartment includes:
• 2 Spacious Bedrooms
• 1 Bathroom
• Living Room
• Lots of closet space throughout
• Hardwood floors throughout
• Eat-in kitchen with dishwasher, gas range/stove
• Large wrap-around front porch
• Lockable storage space in the basement
• Washer and dryer in the basement
• Plenty of street parking
• Both the 2nd and the 3rd floor are occupied by young couples (landlord on the 3rd)
Very Convenient Location:
5-minute walk to the North Quincy T Station
5-minute drive to I-93
5-minute drive to Marina Bay
10-minute walk to Wollaston Beach as well as the Squantum and Wollaston Beach Yatch Clubs
This apartment will be available for September 1st and will require First, Last, and Security Deposit.
Utilities - $100-$250- electric, gas and basic cable/internet
I work a hybrid schedule and I am in the office 3 days a week.
I am looking for someone professional and responsible.
I’m over the party scene
but I do enjoy going out and having friends over for dinner or porch hangs.
The apartment, also comes with a guard dog-
Koda.
Dogs are OK, but not sure if it would be a good fit to have 2 dogs in this apartment.
-Robin
